issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The default value of "hadoop.workaround.non.threadsafe.getpwuid" is false in core-default.xml, but is true in NativeIO.java.
fields.summary: The default value of "hadoop.workaround.non.threadsafe.getpwuid" is different between core-default.xml and NativeIO.java

This message was automatically generated.
Thanks for finding this Akira.  +1 (nonbinding).  The change looks simple enough to me.

Good find.

Hmm.  It's not immediately clear that this configuration key belongs in {{org/apache/hadoop/fs/CommonConfigurationKeysPublic.java}}.  After all, it may be used outside of the "fs" (filesystem) context by things like YARN.  Maybe just change the fault value in {{core-default.xml}}?

Thanks [~rchiang] and [~cmccabe] for review.

bq. Maybe just change the fault value in core-default.xml?
Agree. I'll update the patch shortly.
